ygData.subject: Re: Item Value and Use of Deterioration
ygData.msgSnippet: ... People will say that this would give people an uneasy feeling knowing that they have to give their armor to a smith to have it repaired. ... YES! brilliant
ygData.messageBody:
---------------------------------------
People will say that this would give people an uneasy feeling knowing
that they have to give their armor to a smith to
have it repaired.
----------------------------------------

YES! brilliant thought. So finally that adds another element to it.
Smiths can gain a reputation for both their skill at smithing and their
trustworthiness. You will get repeat customers because you treat them
right. That makes it far more relevant for anyone alro roleplaying the
apprenticeship ideal, through a guild or not, where the student as part
of the master's house gains standing and gets the business too.

Dalinor
FR
